document_data.mainbody:
ate was the sister of an eccentric alchemist who lived in her old houseboat tethered to the Fishers Wharf in Eastway in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
By the , Cate had already been long dead. Her sister Drusilla still cherished Cates memory. The alchemist kept Cates remains in a terra cotta urn decorated with a cameo of her face. When Drusilla made tea, she served a set of clay mugs for the sister, placing them in front of the urn. The alchemist made tea with honeycomb like Cate liked it in life.
